title: Sustainable STEAM Education Design: Project-Based Inquiry and Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: For undergraduate students, exploring STEAM approaches to sustainability issues through mobile-based short-term intensive courses, emphasizing creative solution design for localized socio-environmental challenges

learning_goals: Learners can transform community-environmental issues into sustainable STEAM solutions through project-based learning
Learners can develop prototypes using recycled materials/digital technologies by applying the design thinking process
Learners can integrate scientific data analysis and creative problem-solving skills through inquiry-based learning methods
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
